A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Well the good part is that I can't remember better visuals in a movie for a long time. The special effects team deserves double oscars.\n\nThe Bad part: Everything else. the plot is all over the place with so many holes it is astounding to think that people were paid money for it. I've never been what people would call a true Star wars fan (I  enjoyed the prequels to an extent) but this just brakes the whole universe with a resounding crack.
